articles.description: Scotland have named their 15-member squad for the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup Qualifier in Zimbabwe which is set to commence on 18 June.
articles.content: Scotland have named their 15-member squad for the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup Qualifier in Zimbabwe which is set to commence on 18 June.Scotland have retained much of the same squad that lifted the I… [+1667 chars]

articles.author: Mohammad Isam
articles.title: Bangladesh to host Afghanistan for a full tour in June-July 2023 - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The visit will be broken into two parts though to allow Afghanistan to play a white-ball series in India
articles.content: Afghanistan and Bangladesh have played out some intense games in limited-overs cricket  •  ICC via Getty Images
